article_title: Cynthia Allen: Little Sisters, religious liberty get big win in high court

article_metadata.author: Cynthia M. Allen Fort Worth Star-Telegram

og.description: The Little Sisters of the Poor got a big decision from the U.S Supreme Court last week.
